item.title: Starting_up
item.description: Welcome to the CyberTractor Challenge! This page is under construction.

item.title: About
item.description: The CyberTractor Challenge (English: Tractor Hacking) was started by John Deere in 2022 as a sister event to the more established CyberTruck and CyberAuto challenges, focusing on the cybersecurity of their modern connected Agricultural fleet by bringing college and university students to a real farm in Iowa to get hands on experience with real equipment and real cybersecurity + engineering professionals. As the seeds of CyberTractor sprouted, the goals and scope for this “challenge” have pivoted from focusing on solely the iconic Green and Yellow equipment to include industry peers of all colors.

item.title: Contact
item.description: If you’re interested in learning more about the CyberTractor Challenge, please fill out this form to notify us and a member of our team will be in contact. Your Name Email Address An email address is required. Message
